short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove AI Previews in Google Search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No AI Google Search

Open Source: https://github.com/openchampagne/No-AI-Google-Search

Overview
No AI Google Search is a Chrome extension that enhances your Google search experience by disabling the new AI previews. It automatically removes AI Previews on each search query, ensuring you get the classic Google search results without AI-generated summaries.

Features

	•	Disable AI Previews: Automatically adds a parameter to Google search URLs to turn off AI previews.
	•	Classic Search Experience: Get the traditional Google search results without AI-generated content.

How to Use

	1.	Install the No AI Google Search extension from the Chrome Web Store.
	2.	The extension will automatically remove AI previews

Why Use No AI Google Search?

	•	Simplicity: Enjoy the classic Google search interface without the distraction of AI-generated summaries.
	•	Privacy: Prevent AI previews from analyzing and summarizing search results on your behalf.
	•	Efficiency: Quickly access Google Search with AI previews disabled via the extension icon.


Permissions

	•	Access to google.com to modify search URLs and disable AI previews.

About
No AI Google Search is developed with the aim of providing users with a straightforward and traditional Google search experience. Your feedback and contributions are highly appreciated!

Changelog

	•	Version 0.1.4: Refactors extension to use Content Scripts instead of NetDeclarativeRequests. 
	•	Version 0.1: Initial release with core features to disable AI previews in Google Search.

Install No AI Google Search today and take control of your Google search experience!
